content.question: Scholars think that early medieval fibulae, such as the Merovingian looped fibulae, served as

choices.label: magical objects meant to protect the wearer
ancestral insignia worn to honor the dead
religious objects used in funerary rituals
status symbols owned to enhance prestige

content.answer: status symbols owned to enhance prestige

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.5: Theories and Interpretations of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
